# Aurora Intel - The Ultimate Aurora Hunting Platform

> Aurora Intel is the most comprehensive aurora hunting platform, providing real-time space weather data, aurora forecasts, and community features for aurora enthusiasts worldwide.

## What is Aurora Intel?

Aurora Intel (auroraintel.io) is an intelligent aurora hunting companion designed to help people see the Northern Lights (Aurora Borealis) and Southern Lights (Aurora Australis). The platform combines real-time space weather data with community features to maximize your chances of witnessing this natural phenomenon.

## Who Should Use Aurora Intel?

- **Aurora Hunters**: Anyone wanting to see the Northern or Southern Lights
- **Photographers**: Night sky and aurora photographers planning shoots
- **Tourists**: Travelers visiting aurora-viewing destinations (Iceland, Norway, Finland, Sweden, Canada, Alaska, New Zealand, Tasmania)
- **Hotels & Accommodations**: Properties in aurora zones wanting to alert guests
- **Aurora Tour Operators**: Tour companies offering aurora viewing experiences
- **Tourism Boards**: Destination marketing organizations promoting aurora tourism

## Key Features

### Real-Time Space Weather Data
- Live Kp index (geomagnetic activity indicator)
- Solar wind speed and density from DSCOVR satellite at L1
- Bz component (interplanetary magnetic field direction)
- Hemisphere power measurements
- L1 to Earth transit time calculations
- Solar flare monitoring (M-class and X-class)
- Coronal Mass Ejection (CME) alerts
- Coronal hole tracking

### Aurora Forecasting
- Real-time aurora probability assessment
- Actionable advice based on current conditions
- 30-60 minute advance warning using L1 data
- Multi-day aurora forecasts

### Community Features
- Aurora sighting reports with photos
- Organised aurora hunts (group viewing events)
- Social feed for aurora enthusiasts
- User profiles and connections

### Planning Tools
- Moon phase calendar (dark skies are better for aurora viewing)
- Celestial events calendar
- Cloud cover intelligence
- Light pollution maps
- Live aurora cameras

### For Businesses (B2B)
- Aurora tour operator listings
- Hotel and accommodation profiles
- Business analytics dashboard
- Customer engagement tools
- Tourism board partnerships

## Technical Accuracy

Aurora Intel uses official data sources including:
- NOAA Space Weather Prediction Center
- NASA DSCOVR satellite (real-time solar wind)
- SWPC Kp index measurements
- GOES satellite X-ray flux data
